_comment: D-PC Privacy Rules - Controls who can access your context data and compute resources. By default, all access is denied.

hub._comment: What the Federation Hub can see for discovery (ONLY this data is visible to the Hub)
hub.personal.json:profile.name: allow

node_groups._comment: Define which nodes belong to which groups for easier permission management

file_groups._comment: Define aliases for groups of context files

ai_scopes._comment: AI Scope Filtering - Control what your LOCAL AI can access in different modes. NEW in v0.12.1: Field-level filtering for personal.json AND device_context.json
ai_scopes._examples: Supports both file groups (@work) and field-level filtering (device_context.json:hardware.gpu.*)

work._comment: Work mode - Access work files + hardware specs for dev assistance

personal._comment: Personal mode - Access personal files, hide work context and GPU specs

basic._comment: Basic mode - Minimal context (profile only), no hardware details
basic.personal.json:profile.name: allow

research._comment: Research mode - Full hardware access for performance optimization queries

device_sharing._comment: Control what device info is shared (device_context.json)

compute._comment: Remote Inference Permissions - Controls who can use your local AI models. This does NOT share hardware access, only API access to run AI models on your device.

file_transfer._comment: File Transfer Permissions - Controls who can send/receive files with you

image_transfer._comment: Screenshot/image transfer settings (P2P clipboard paste). Controls auto-accept behavior, size limits, and storage for pasted images.

notifications._comment: Desktop Notification Settings - Controls when system notifications appear (when app is minimized/background)
